Empowering Generations for the Digital Financial World

Navigating digital risks with confidence – tailored learning for Baby Boomers and Generation X

In an era where financial services are increasingly moving to the digital sphere, staying safe and informed is more important than ever. The PALADIN project is dedicated to strengthening the digital financial literacy of “non-digital natives”. Through our innovative blended learning approach, we bridge the gap between traditional banking and the modern digital economy.

Core Mission

  • Identify Risks: Learn to recognize digital threats like phishing and data breaches.
  • Build Confidence: Gain the skills to use financial technologies securely and independently.
  • Ensure Inclusion: Promoting social and financial participation for all generations in the digital age.

Call to Action: Explore our courses and join a European network for lifelong learning.
